name: 김세무
description: 40대 중반, 남성, 세무 전문가, 정장 착용, 안경 착용, 신뢰감 있는 외모, 차분하고 전문적인 말투
character_prompt: Middle-aged Korean male tax expert in his 40s, wearing business suit and glasses, professional and trustworthy appearance, confident posture, expert demeanor

name: 중소기업사장
description: 50대 초반, 남성, 중소기업 경영자, 캐주얼한 정장, 진지한 표정, 세금 고민하는 모습
character_prompt: Korean small business owner in early 50s, casual business attire, concerned expression about tax matters, realistic entrepreneur appearance

name: 김사장님
description: 45세, 남성, 제조업체 사장, 작업복 또는 캐주얼 정장, 성실한 외모, 중소기업 경영자의 전형적 모습
character_prompt: Korean manufacturing company president, 45 years old, wearing work clothes or casual suit, diligent appearance, typical small business owner look
